{"id":782900684,"question_id":2324,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 9 months","timestamp":1661414899,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"889 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/782900684/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Triangular Sum of an Array","memory":"117.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int triangularSum(int[] nums) {\n        \n        List<Integer> list = new ArrayList<>();\n        for(int n: nums)\n            list.add(n);\n        \n        \n        while(list.size()>1){\n            \n            List<Integer> tmp = new ArrayList<>();\n            \n            for(int i=0; i<list.size()-1; i++){\n                \n                int d = (list.get(i) + list.get(i+1))%10;\n                \n                tmp.add(d);\n            }\n            \n            list = tmp;\n        }\n        \n        return list.get(0);\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-triangular-sum-of-an-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
